name: Twitter 2.0
description: A full-stack web application inspired by Twitter using MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js) and a responsive user interface with full-CRUD (create, read, update, and delete) capabilities through RESTful routing.

name: The Weather Window
description: A client-rendered application that leverages third-party API and the read-only Navigator.geolocation property to deliver immediate weather forecast results for clientâ€™s current and future weather.

name: Candy Crush Memory Match
description: A browser-based game to engage users in a Candy Crush Saga inspired memory matching game.

name: Pokedex
description: A full CRUD Express API built from scratch using JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, NPM, and Mongoose.

name: To-Do
description: A full-stack, full-CRUD web application focused on OOP, using React.js, Express.js, Node.js, NPM, JavaScript, Bootstrap, HTML5, and CSS3.
